I am from Barichara (Colombia) and after: I am from Barichara (Colombia) and after graduating as a chemical engineer I started working for the oil and gas industry. I moved to Canada to get my PhD degree, and then to London for work. The company relocated me to Chicagoland in 2014, and somehow I managed to meet this funny and cute Italian right after I came back from my first trip to Italy. I love to travel and photography!

I went to visit a Colombian couple who I: I went to visit a Colombian couple who I had met more than a year ago at a friendâ€™s birthday party. Michele had started an internship at Fermi-Lab six months before, and he happened to live in the same house with them. We met that day and since I had just returned from my first trip to Italy, we found a lot of things to talk about. We also found out that we both wanted to go to Alinea â€“ a famous restaurant in Chicago â€“ so, we agreed on planning to go together..
After a couple of months hanging out wit: After a couple of months hanging out with the group of friends, we finally got to go to Alinea. This was our first time going out without any other friends. Michele was planning to tell me about his feelings, but he decided not to do it. That day was special and we had a great time together.
Some days later, we met at a fondue and: Some days later, we met at a fondue and raclette night at a friendâ€™s house. I had been picked up by a friend, so I needed a ride to go back home. Michele offered me a ride and he got the courage to talk about what he was feeling. This is how it all started!
After a year and a half into the relatio: After a year and a half into the relationship, we went to Italy to visit Micheleâ€™s family. With a bit of sea sickness after waiting in a boat to go into the Blue Grotto in Capri, Michele popped up the question and I said yes!
The first she encountered Michele was a: The first she encountered Michele was a play of the destiny. She had just returned from a beautiful trip to Italy, and some friends which she happened to randomly meet one year before during her stay in Chicago, invited her to go to their house, place which they were sharing with him. They immediately found a lot of things to talk about, one of which was his completely unsuccessful research for a partner to enjoy a dinner at Alinea â€“ a famous restaurant in Chicago - which they decided on the spot to go together.
We kept hanging out for a couple of mont: We kept hanging out for a couple of months, together with friends, until we finally hit the day for our Alinea Reservation ( It took literally months of waiting ). This was our first time going out together, and he thought this might have been a good occasion to put his feelings in words. Things that didnâ€™t happen, due to some unexpected complications ( love is hard )
A few days later, we had another group a: A few days later, we had another group activity with friends, raclette night! He offered to drive her to the party and back to the house, with the idea to donâ€™t delay anymore what he had to say. He put together some sentences which kind of made sense, and then blushed like a red pepper. Well, this is how it all started!
After some time into the relationship, h: After some time into the relationship, he decided that it was time for his family, living in Italy, to meet her. Nothing she knew that he was traveling with a sparkling gift for her. The plan was drawn with a specific idea, and performed fighting against the summer heat and some sea sickness, but once they entered in the Blue Grotto, he opened his perfectly hidden box, and said the fateful words, which were replied by a lovely yes!
I love you without knowing how, or when,:
I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where.
						I love you straightforwardly, without complexities or pride;
						so I love you because I know no other way than this: 
						where I does not exist, nor you,
						so close that your hand on my chest is my hand,
						so close that your eyes close as I fall asleep.
							â€¢ Pablo Neruda, Sonnet XVII
